subject: Doping (Sports)
Shot Put
Olympic Games
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: The former Olympic shot-put champion Udo Beyer admitted doping, saying in a documentary that he won the gold medal in 1976 in Montreal because he was “the best” and not because he doped.
snippet: The former Olympic shot-put champion Udo Beyer admitted doping, saying in a documentary that he won the gold medal in 1976 in Montreal because he was “the best” and not because he doped.
